Mod.name: Disable Friendly Fire (Reworked)
Mod.description:
Disables friendly fire caused by the majority of player spells.

Exceptions include:
- Deadly Heal
- Bloodlust
- Piercing Shot

 There might be other exceptions since I did not test every single spell, please report any oddities.

Note that you still take damage from environmental effects caused by your spells(fire, lightning, etc).
